food.title: Onion Dosa
food.fd:
Ingredients:
1.Dosa batter
2.Chopped onions, green chilies, and coriander leaves
3.Salt
4.Oil.

Instructions:
1.Heat a griddle.
2.Pour dosa batter, spread thin.
3.Add onion mixture, drizzle oil.
4.Cook until crispy.
5.Serve hot with chutney.

food.title: Oreo Cake
food.fd:
Ingredients:
1.Oreo cookies
2.Milk
3.Baking powder
4.Sugar
5.Butter
6.Vanilla extract
7.Whipped cream (optional)

Instructions:
1.Crush Oreos, mix with milk and baking powder for batter.
2.Cream sugar, butter, add batter, vanilla.
3.Bake at 350°F (180°C) for 30-40 mins.
4.Cool, frost with whipped cream, and decorate with Oreos.
5.Slice and serve. Enjoy your Oreo Cake!

Ingredients:
1.Rice
2.Protein (chicken, vegetables)
3.Spices (cinnamon, cardamom, cloves)
4.Onions, tomatoes, ginger-garlic paste
5.Yogurt
6.Ghee/oil
7.Salt
Instructions:
1.Saute spices, onions.
2.Add ginger-garlic paste, tomatoes.
3.Mix in protein, yogurt, spices.
4.Layer with rice.
5.Seal, cook until rice is done.
6.Serve with raita or salad.
Enjoy your Biryani!
food.title: Biriyani
